messages.subject: Homeschool Kids Magazine - Reminder notice!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there, It s time to send in your submissions to the magazine!  Is there something you ve been doing in homeschool that you can copy and paste and email in?
messages.messageBody:
Hi there,

It's time to send in your submissions to the magazine! Is there
something you've been doing in homeschool that you can copy and paste
and email in? Or do you have a hobby you'd like to share about? Or
a favourite recipe? A joke that made you giggle? Please email them
in for our March edition!

I look forward to reading your items - I had a great time last month
reading your stories,poems, essays, recipes and jokes!

Email all your submissuins to:
homeschool_kids_magazine@...

Mrs T.
Editor
Homeschool Kids Magazine
http://pages.ivillage.com/mumof4nz/homeschoolkidsmagazine
